text: Ivanoe Bonomi Correct Italian pronunciations of the name Ivanoe are available in the Dizionario d'ortografia e di pronunzia online. (18 October 1873 - 20 April 1951) was an Italian statesman. He was the 25th Prime Minister of Italy from 1921 until 1922 and again during 1944 until 1945. ==References== Category:1873 births Category:1951 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Italy Category:Presidents of the Italian Senate Category:Politicians from Lombardy Category:People from Mantua
title: Ivanoe Bonomi
